data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Paphos a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Paphos, Cyprus
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Paphos, Cyprus who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.section_summary: On average, 7 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Paphos, Cyprus.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Jesus, please help the 1,220 believers in the state of Paphos to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Jesus, help the church in the state of Paphos to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.

Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Persian people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Persian people.
God, we pray for the believers in Paphos, Cyprus that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.
Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Paphos, Cyprus to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.section_summary:
the state of Paphos, Cyprus has a population of 95,400.

We estimate Paphos has 1,220 people who might know Jesus, 67,386 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 26,794 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 78 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Paphos, Cyprus to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist
